title: Samsung P-7500XXLQ8 ROM for GT-P7500 (Galaxy Tab 10.1)
description:
Stock ROM for Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 WiFi+3G (GT-P7500)


PDA: P7500XXLQ8
CSC: P7500OXALQ8
Version: 4.0.4
Date: 2012-07-11
Regions: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom

Instructions:
1. Make sure your tablet has the right CSC (look under Settings/About).
2. Download and run Odin.
3. Unzip the ROM file, and select it in Odin using the PDA button.
4. Turn off your tablet.
5. Press and hold down the Power and Volume Down buttons simultaneously, and release when the menu appears.
6. Use the Volume Down button to select the Download option, and press the Volume Up button to activate.
7. Click the Start button in Odin, and follow instructions on your tablet's screen.
8. After the ROM is successfully installed, the device reboots. Follow instructions on your tablet's screen to wipe cache and data (optional), and then reboot.

Needless to say, you should backup all important data on your tablet first. Even if you don't do the optional wipe at the end, something may cause your data to disappear.
